r.s: Lua interpreter with limits and safe environment
r.d: LuaSandbox is an extension for running untrusted Lua code within a PHP web request. Code is run in a stripped-down, safe environment. Time and memory limits can be set.
r.n: - Add docbook documentation (for php.net) - Flag optional and variadic parameters properly for PHP reflection - Remove memory leaks in data_conversion.c - Drop PHP5 and HHVM compatibility - Add PHP 8 support - Windows compilation fixes
